There are two separate workouts that are done on alternating days, six days a week.

title: 1 Exercise
text:
Past protocols


March - May 2025


EWOT
EWOT or Exercise With Oxygen Therapy is a powerful modality. Here is what I’m doing.
There are two separate workouts that are done on alternating days, seven days a week.

Workout A:








Tabata EWOT Workout A


High-Intensity Interval Training with Oxygen Protocol


Activity
Instructions
Duration
Intensity




1. WARMUP


Without Oxygen
Moderate activity
2 minutes
Low (40-50%)


With Oxygen
Moderate activity with oxygen
2 minutes
Low (40-50%)


2. SPRINT CLUSTERS (Repeat 3-5 clusters)


Sprint Interval
All-out maximum effort
20 seconds
Maximum (100%)


Rest Interval
Complete rest
10 seconds
None (0%)


Repeat
Repeat sprint/rest intervals 3-5 times to complete one cluster
~2.5 minutes per complete cluster
Alternating


Recovery Between Clusters
Moderate pace after completing each cluster
2 minutes
Moderate (40-60%)


3. STEADY STATE


Calorie Target
Continue at normal steady state
Until reaching 500 calories
Moderate (60-70%)







This workout is tough. Use contrast as well (breath low-oxygen during sprints).


Workout B:








Steady State EWOT Workout B


Steady State Training with Oxygen Protocol


Activity
Instructions
Duration
Intensity




1. WARMUP


With Oxygen
Moderate activity with oxygen
2 minutes
Low (40-50%)


2. STEADY STATE


With Oxygen
Moderate - Heavy activity with oxygen
Until reaching 500 - 1,000 calories
Moderate (40-60%)







Also use contrast here, alternating low oxygen with high.

title: Routine
text:
When you have something like cancer, you realize that whatever you were doing when you became sick, may have been the reason why you became sick. Wherever you were at physically, mentally, socially, emotionally – you need to get away from that state!
Routine is the habits that set our physical, mental, social and emotional state.
I realized early on that in order to make all the changes that I needed to make, these things had to fit into a routine that I could check off each day.
Below I outline the routine and further expand on the components in later sections.

Weekly tasks
Exercise & thermal exposure


Expand for detail

asdfadf


6 EWOT sessions on an elliptical

4 days contrast (high and low oxygen)
2 days Norweigan 4x4 (VO2 max training)

3 days strength

Sand 2.0 program sandbag workouts

2 cold plunge sessions, ~ 50F
2 Hockatt or steam room sessions



Daily tasks
Lymph


Expand for detail

asdfadf


Rebounding or shake plate with red light therapy (10 mins)
Contrast showers

Breathwork


Expand for detail

asdfadf


1-3 sessions of breath work withe the Oxygen Advantage app
Wim Hof breathing

Prayer

Without ceasing

Drugs


Expand for detail

asdfadf


Tazverik, 800mg 2/x day
Ivermectin, ~80mg (1mg/kg body weight) but visual effects force me to cycle this

Supplements


Expand for detail

asdfadf


Causenta-prescribed

DAO Degrade
Gut Defend

Powerful probiotic

Hist Fx

Regulates histamine response (allergies, etc)

Krill Oil (DFH)

To fix an imbalance in my omega-3 to omega-6 ratio
Also increase levels of plasmologens (anti-cancer)

Menadione (K3)
Optimum Butyrate

Supports gut health and immune function

ProResolve Plus
Spore Defend

Broad-spectrum probiotic

Vitamin C
Vitamin K1

Testing found that I was very low here

Hoxsey-like Formula

Support detox and lymphatic function

Optimum Binder

Binds with toxins that are released through detox activities like EWOT and hyperthermia

Boswellia Plus

Prescribed for pain, also has anti-cancer effects


My own research

Vitamin D3 with K2
Nanolite xxxx
Curcumin/turmeric
